1.0.name: wordpress/dot-htmlphpxml-etc-pages
1.0.description: This plugin allows you to create custom URLs for ur pages, for your WordPress blog. This Plugin Adds .php, html, .xml etc SIGNATURE Extension to Your Pages Like http://www.yoursitename.com/yourpage.php,.html,xml any signature. WARNING: FIRST DEACTIVATE THE OTHER EXTENSION PAGES PLUGIN. Just Activate The Plugin And Setting The Pages Through Setting->Dot html,php,xml etc pages.
